borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p style="">The depth, scale, massing, and design of the proposed development&nbsp;would be overbearing and incongruous addition&nbsp;to the host <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="dweliinghouse" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="lrru28dwvwfxgyl5m" style="">dweliinghouse</span>, failing to be subordinate or harmonise with the scale and proportions of the host <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="dwellinghouse" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="lrru28dvtcz6jurys" style="">dwellinghouse</span>&nbsp;and the terrace. The proposal would have a negative impact on the character of the wider area including <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="Becontree" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="lrru28i3uqowqb74n" style="">Becontree</span> Estate.&nbsp;The proposed development&nbsp;is contrary to:<br></p><ul><li style="">Paragraphs 131, 135, 195, 200, and 209&nbsp;of the National Planning Policy Framework (December&nbsp;2023)<br></li><li style="">Policies&nbsp;D4 and HC1&nbsp;of the London Plan (March 2021)<br></li><li style="">Policies&nbsp;CP2 and CP3&nbsp;of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)<br></li><li style="">Policies&nbsp;BP2&nbsp;and BP11&nbsp;of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011) <br></li><li style="">Strategic Policy SP 2 as well as Policies DMD 1, DMD 4,&nbsp;and DMD 6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan 2037&nbsp;(Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li></ul>

<p style="">The depth, scale, massing, and design of the proposed development would result in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss of outlook and daylight to neighbouring occupiers, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:</p><ul><li>Paragraph 135(f) of the National Planning Policy Framework (December&nbsp;2023)<br></li><li>Policy&nbsp;D6 of the London Plan (March 2021)<br></li><li>Policies BP8 and BP11 of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)<br></li><li>Policies DMD1 and DMD6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan 2037&nbsp;(Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)<br></li><li>Paragraphs 4.2 and 5.3.2&nbsp;of the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)</li></ul>
description: Demolition of existing conservatory and construction of a single storey rear extension
